alert.note: Alert for Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gordon County through 315 PM EDT... At 237 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Calhoun, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, pea sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Resaca, Ranger, Sonoraville, Oostanaula, Sugar Valley, Redbud, Nickelsville and Audubon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
